THE STRATEGIES AND GUIDELINES TO BE VICTORIOUS IN THE BATTLES OF LIFE IN WHICH WE FACE.

The art of war is based on deception. So when you're able to attack, 
you must appear incapacitated and, when the troops move, appear inactive. If you are near the enemy, you must make him believe that you are far away; if far away, make it appear that you are near. Put baits to lure the enemy.

Strike the enemy when he is disorderly. Prepare against it when it is safe everywhere. Avoid it for a while when it is strongest. If your opponent has a choleric temper, try to irritate him. If he is arrogant, he tries to foster his selfishness. 
If enemy troops feel well prepared after a reorganization, try to disarray them. If they are united, it sows dissension among their ranks. He attacks the enemy when he's not ready, and he shows up when he's not expecting you. These are the keys to victory by Strategy.

"VICTORY IS RESERVED FOR THOSE WHO WANT TO PAY THE PRICE."*
